An uncouth , crude , or ill - bred person ; a boor ., 粗人笨拙的 , 粗鲁的或无教养的人;

entry.tran: 教养差的;粗野的;无礼的
entry.def: If you say that someone is ill-bred, you mean that they have bad manners.

example.ex: They seemed to her rather vulgar and ill-bred.
example.tran: 在她看来他们非常粗俗无礼。

means.word_mean: 1. (of persons) lacking in refinement or grace
